root.name: MechWarrior 3: Pirate's Moon
root.description: Overview MechWarrior 3: Pirate's Moon is the expansion pack for MechWarrior 3, with a new storyline, 20-new missions, six-new 'Mechs, and new weapons. The player has the choice to play as either Connor Sinclair, aÂ Lance Leader of the Eridani Light Horse mercenary unit and the silent protagonist of MechWarrior 3, or as Scourge, a New Belt Pirate. Unlike MechWarrior 3, the both playable characters have dialogue spoken by a voice actor.The additional 'Mechs were: AtlasAwesomeCenturionClint IIC (a Clan refit of the old Inner Sphere model) Masakari / Warhawk Ryoken / Stormcrow Clan Elemental battle armor
